comment:
>>44318714
oh god fucking damn it

Hecatelia is the very first on our hit list, but we're gonna need a massive power boost in order to depose her. This shit doesn't sit right with me at all.

My shadowrunning is strong here, but I guarantee that she's got some shit going down with Anaximander. Hell, Hecatel probably has a lot of artifacts-- if she's a player-- or worse, is just a straight up precursor. Either way, I'm betting that the chances of her getting her name on an altar by itself isn't just 'luck'.
